summary: The customer was having an issue with their phone and wanted to downgrade their plan. The customer service agent provided several options for downgrading, ranging from the Basic Plan with 500 MB of data for $35 a month to the Premium Plan with 5 GB of data for $55 a month. The customer ultimately decided to go with the Enhanced Plan which includes unlimited talk and text plus 2 GB of data per month for $45 a month.
